qrList.label: init
qrList.message:
/echo Initializing |
/if left=lvl right=0 rule=gt "/abort" |

/buttons labels=["Normal","Hard"] Select difficulty |
/if left={{pipe}} right=Normal rule=eq else="/setvar key=hardmode true" "/setvar key=hardmode false" |
/if left=hardmode right=true rule=eq else="/setvar key=linescale 2 \| /setvar key=hp 5" "/setvar key=linescale 0.2 \| /setvar key=hp 3" |

/setvar key=lvl 0 |
/setvar key=cooldown 2 |
/setvar key=angle 0 |
/setvar key=mapw 500 |
/setvar key=maph 400 | /setvar key=line |
/setvar key=encounter false |

/setvar key=tanksmoke https://creamsan.neocities.org/files/assets/tanksmoke.gif |

/setvar key=i 0 |
/times 4 "/addvar key=i 1 \| /setvar key=tank\{\{getvar::i\}\} https://creamsan.neocities.org/files/assets/tank\{\{getvar::i\}\}.png \|
/setvar key=tank\{\{getvar::i\}\}gun https://creamsan.neocities.org/files/assets/tank\{\{getvar::i\}\}gun.png \| /setvar key=enemy\{\{getvar::i\}\}smoke hidden \|
/setvar key=enemy\{\{getvar::i\}\}tank hidden" |

/setvar key=tank1gunxoffset 13 |
/setvar key=tank1gunyoffset 41 |
/setvar key=tank1xoffset 18 |
/setvar key=tank1yoffset 30 |

/setvar key=tank2gunxoffset 13 |
/setvar key=tank2gunyoffset 25 |
/setvar key=tank2xoffset 18 |
/setvar key=tank2yoffset 33 |

/setvar key=tank3gunxoffset 13 |
/setvar key=tank3gunyoffset 40 |
/setvar key=tank3xoffset 18 |
/setvar key=tank3yoffset 33 |

/setvar key=tank4gunxoffset 13 |
/setvar key=tank4gunyoffset 55 |
/setvar key=tank4xoffset 18 |
/setvar key=tank4yoffset 33 |

/setvar key=tanksmokexoffset 100 |
/setvar key=tanksmokeyoffset 180 |

/setvar index=1 key=chancesnormal 4 |
/setvar index=2 key=chancesnormal 3 |
/setvar index=3 key=chancesnormal 8 |
/setvar index=4 key=chancesnormal 6 |
/setvar index=5 key=chancesnormal 12 |
/setvar index=6 key=chancesnormal 9 |
/setvar index=7 key=chancesnormal 12 |
/setvar index=8 key=chancesnormal 8 |

/setvar index=1 key=chanceshard 3 |
/setvar index=2 key=chanceshard 2 |
/setvar index=3 key=chanceshard 6 |
/setvar index=4 key=chanceshard 4 |
/setvar index=5 key=chanceshard 9 |
/setvar index=6 key=chanceshard 6 |
/setvar index=7 key=chanceshard 8 |
/setvar index=8 key=chanceshard 6 |

/setvar index=1 key=lvlenemycount 1 |
/setvar index=2 key=lvlenemycount 1 |
/setvar index=3 key=lvlenemycount 2 |
/setvar index=4 key=lvlenemycount 2 |
/setvar index=5 key=lvlenemycount 3 |
/setvar index=6 key=lvlenemycount 3 |
/setvar index=7 key=lvlenemycount 4 |
/setvar index=8 key=lvlenemycount 4 |

/setvar key=distances index=0 200 |
/setvar key=distances index=1 250 |
/setvar key=distances index=2 300 |
/setvar key=distances index=3 350 |
/setvar key=distances index=4 385 |

/setvar key=200m index=maxangle 85 |
/setvar key=200m index=precision 4 |
/setvar key=200m index=maxspeed 10 |

/setvar key=250m index=maxangle 50 |
/setvar key=250m index=precision 3 |
/setvar key=250m index=maxspeed 5 |

/setvar key=300m index=maxangle 40 |
/setvar key=300m index=precision 2 |
/setvar key=300m index=maxspeed 5 |

/setvar key=350m index=maxangle 30 |
/setvar key=350m index=precision 2 |
/setvar key=350m index=maxspeed 2 |

/setvar key=385m index=maxangle 25 |
/setvar key=385m index=precision 1 |
/setvar key=385m index=maxspeed 2

qrList.label: userprocess
qrList.message:
/setvar key=userinput {{input}} |
/if left=hp right=0 rule=lte "/setvar key=jbout - \| /abort" |
/if left=lvl right=8 rule=gt "/setvar key=jbout - \| /abort" |
/setvar key=log Event log: |
/setvar key=jbout No enemies for now. |
/if left=cooldown right=0 rule=eq "/run teamneko.genenemies" |
/addvar key=cooldown -1 |
/run teamneko.detectencounter |
/if left=encounter right=true rule=eq "/run teamneko.aimloop \| /setvar key=cooldown {{random: 0,1}} \| /setvar key=encounter false" |
/flushvar nadanada

qrList.label: aim
aimloop
qrList.message:
/setvar key=looping true |
/setvar key=tempangle 0 |
/setvar key=bg {{random: https://c.tenor.com/0e6lbNV-AEYAAAAd/tenor.gif,
https://opengameart.org/sites/default/files/backgrounddetailed1.png,
https://opengameart.org/sites/default/files/backgrounddetailed2.png,
https://opengameart.org/sites/default/files/backgrounddetailed3.png,
https://opengameart.org/sites/default/files/backgrounddetailed5.png,
https://opengameart.org/sites/default/files/backgrounddetailed6.png,
https://opengameart.org/sites/default/files/backgrounddetailed7.png,
https://opengameart.org/sites/default/files/backgrounddetailed8.png,
https://opengameart.org/sites/default/files/backgrounddetailed1.png,
https://opengameart.org/sites/default/files/backgrounddetailed2.png,
https://opengameart.org/sites/default/files/backgrounddetailed3.png,
https://opengameart.org/sites/default/files/backgrounddetailed5.png,
https://opengameart.org/sites/default/files/backgrounddetailed6.png,
https://opengameart.org/sites/default/files/backgrounddetailed7.png,
https://opengameart.org/sites/default/files/backgrounddetailed8.png}} |

/while left=looping right=true rule=eq "/run teamneko.aim"

qrList.label: validateaiminput
qrList.message:
/setvar key=validaiminput true |
/flushvar toreplace |
/setvar key=regexflags gi |

/setvar key=regex [^a-z\d-] |
/regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::tempangle}} |
/setvar key=tempangle |

/if left=tempangle right=surrender rule=eq "/setvar key=angle 0 \| /setvar key=hp 0" |

/if left=chances right=0 rule=lte "/run teamneko.rolltakedmg" |

/if left=hp right=0 rule=lte "/echo severity=error Your team is eliminated. Game over. \| /setvar key=looping false \| /run teamneko.gameover \| /abort" |

/if left=tempangle right=fire rule=eq "/setvar key=enemyprocess hitenemy \| /setvar key=hitsinarow 0 \| /run teamneko.scanenemies" |

/setvar key=regex [^\d-] |
/regex name=regexreplace {{getvar::tempangle}} |
/setvar key=tempangle |
/setvar key=varname tempangle |
/run creamsan.isvardefined |
/if left={{pipe}} right=false rule=eq "/setvar key=validaiminput false" |

/if left=tempangle right=- rule=eq "/setvar key=validaiminput false" |

/if left=tempangle right=-- rule=eq "/setvar key=validaiminput false" |

/if left=validaiminput right=true rule=eq "/setvar key=angle {{getvar::tempangle}}" |

/addvar key=chances -1 |
/max 0 chances | /setvar key=chances |

/setvar key=enemyprocess moveenemy |
/run teamneko.scanenemies

qrList.label: hitenemy
qrList.message:
/setvar key=ishit true |
/addvar key=i 1 |

/getvar enemy{{getvar::i}}currangle | /setvar key=enemyangle |
/getvar enemy{{getvar::i}}dist |
/getvar index=precision {{pipe}}m | /setvar key=precision |
/mul -1 precision | /add {{pipe}} enemyangle |
/setvar key=minanglehit |
/add precision enemyangle |
/setvar key=maxanglehit |
/if left=angle right=minanglehit rule=lt "/setvar key=ishit false" |
/if left=angle right=maxanglehit rule=gt "/setvar key=ishit false" |
/if left=ishit right=false rule=eq "/abort" |

/if left=enemy{{getvar::i}}smoke right=hidden rule=eq "/setvar key=enemy{{getvar::i}}smoke visible \| /setvar key=enemy{{getvar::i}}speed 0 \| /addvar key=enemyremaining -1 \| /addvar key=hitsinarow 1 \| /echo Nice shot!" |
/if left=hitsinarow right=1 rule=gt "/setvar key=log {{getvar::log}}{{newline}}- With her luck and skill, {{user}}-chan took out {{getvar::hitsinarow}} tanks in a row with a single shot.
- Crewmates praise {{user}}-chan.
- This makes Miki wet her panties.
- Emi hugs {{user}}-chan in excitement while fondling her boobs and stroking her thighs.
- Ayame blushes. She keeps stealing glances." |
/if left=enemyremaining right=0 rule=lte "/run teamneko.winbattle"

qrList.label: genenemies
qrList.message:
/if left=lvl right=8 rule=gte "/echo No more encounters. \| /abort" |

/addvar key=lvl 1 |
/setvar key=enemyprocess resetenemy |
/run teamneko.scanenemies |
/setvar key=arr {{getvar::distances}} |
/run creamsan.shuffle |

/getvar index={{getvar::lvl}} lvlenemycount |
/setvar key=enemycount | /setvar key=enemyremaining |
/setvar key=enemyprocess genenemy |
/run teamneko.scanenemies |

/setvar key=jbout Enemy spotted. Number of enemies: {{getvar::enemycount}}. Prepare for battle. Include the following codeblock in the response: ```
BEGIN BATTLE
``` |

/if left=hardmode right=true rule=eq else="/getvar index={{getvar::lvl}} chancesnormal \| /setvar key=chances" "/getvar index={{getvar::lvl}} chanceshard \| /setvar key=chances"

qrList.label: genenemy
qrList.message:
/getvar index={{getvar::i}} arr |
/setvar key=dist | /setvar key=distkey {{pipe}}m |

/addvar key=i 1 |
/setvar key=enemy{{getvar::i}}dist {{getvar::dist}} |

/getvar index=maxangle {{getvar::distkey}} |
/rand from=-{{pipe}} to={{pipe}} round=round |
/setvar key=enemy{{getvar::i}}currangle |

/getvar index=maxspeed {{getvar::distkey}} |
/rand from=-{{pipe}} to={{pipe}} round=round |
/setvar key=enemy{{getvar::i}}speed |

/setvar key=enemy{{getvar::i}}tank visible

qrList.label: rolltakedmg
qrList.message:
/pass {{roll: d3}} |
/if left={{pipe}} right=2 rule=gte "/addvar key=hp -1 \| /max 0 hp \| /setvar key=hp \| /setvar key=log {{getvar::log}}{{newline}}- The crew's tank has taken damage during the battle.
- Miki is angry and wants to shoot more at defeated enemy tanks.
- Emi pretends to be scared and hugs {{user}}-chan, but grabs her boobs.
- Ayame continues to drive, but blushes and steals glances. \| /echo severity=warning You have taken damage."

qrList.label: gameover
qrList.message:
/popup
| /setvar key=jbout Game over. Their tank has been disabled by their opponent. They are eliminated from the match.

qrList.label: winbattle
qrList.message:
/setvar key=looping false |
/setvar key=jbout The team won the battle. They have defeated {{getvar::enemycount}} enemy tank(s). But they still have a long way to go to reunite with the main group.

{{getvar::log}} |
/echo severity=success You've won the battle. |
/if left=lvl right=8 rule=gte "/run teamneko.showendingpopup"

qrList.label: showendingpopup
qrList.message:
/popup

Congratulations





Thanks for checking out my card. If you've made it this far, it means that the script is working as intended, I really hope so. If you encountered any problems, please let me know.
From this point on you should use the normal send button on the right instead of the QR send button.


| /setvar key=jbout The crew survived and managed to rejoin with the main squad. It seems that they also wiped out the opposing teams, so they won the match. {{getvar::log}}

qrList.label: moveenemy
qrList.message:
/setvar key=toreverse false |
/addvar key=i 1 |

/getvar enemy{{getvar::i}}speed |
/setvar key=enemyspeed |
/getvar enemy{{getvar::i}}dist |
/getvar index=maxangle {{pipe}}m |
/setvar key=maxangle |
/getvar enemy{{getvar::i}}currangle |
/setvar key=enemyangle |
/add enemyangle enemyspeed | /setvar key=newangle |
/if left=newangle right=-{{getvar::maxangle}} rule=lt "/setvar key=toreverse true" |
/if left=newangle right=maxangle rule=gt "/setvar key=toreverse true" |
/if left=toreverse right=true rule=eq "/mul -1 enemyspeed \| /setvar key=enemy{{getvar::i}}speed \| /setvar key=enemyspeed \| /add {{pipe}} enemyangle \| /setvar key=newangle" |

/if left=enemy{{getvar::i}}smoke right=hidden rule=eq "/setvar key=enemy{{getvar::i}}currangle {{getvar::newangle}}"

qrList.label: detectencounter
qrList.message:
/setvar key=tomsgprocess {{lastMessage}} |
/setvar key=startregex ```\s* |
/setvar key=endregex \s*``` |
/run creamsan.regextract |
/if left={{pipe}} right=battle rule=in "/setvar key=encounter true"
